mention.text: Members of the Berkeley Police Association , which represents the city 's officers
our community and share in their concerns
A spokeswoman for Berkeley Mayor Tom Bates
the actions taken by Chief Meehan
a Feb. 18 incident in which a man who 's been described as mentally ill allegedly entered the property of Berkeley hills homeowner Peter Cukor and killed him with a flower pot
a man who 's been described as mentally ill allegedly
an independent and thoroughly informed media
